TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. But they forgot audio.

I wish for a hologram in front of me.

Granted, turns out to be Emperor Palpatine(Lord Popestan or wathev his name was) , forcing you to execute order 66 to your planet(Which btw i also have no idea what is Order 66).

I wish to have better knowledge of planet modding.

Granted. Now you have to live there.
If you can.

I explain to Palpatine The Stupid that the Order 66 he is refering to, is an obsolete Stop Loss Order from Forex Exchange which has been closed many years ago, so nobody can execute it anymore.
The jerk jumps into the power shaft from grief, so nobody can stop us from finishing the shindig of the squid and ewok lovers calling themselves "rebels" which this puny loser was desperately trying to defeat losing fleet by fleet like the most pathetic galaxy shame.

Granted, I made one: a kerbal meme video.

I wish to get a small chunk of Minmus to eat

Granted. Have some blue cheese.

I wish to have a good nights sleep

Granted. I hope you didn't forget to take your earphones off, like somebody here did.

I wish that thing, looking at you from the wardrobe door, can't disturb you.

Granted: It can't disturb you but it feels very disturbed by you.

I wish there was a point at which people didn't feel the need to keep expanding and paving the planet but just felt comfortable with what they have.

Granted. The Earth becomes a moonless rogue planet with the rest of the people living in a cave.

I wish Ancient Egyptians had instagram.

Granted, they get jealous of each other. So much they... salvage(!) them. Population went extinct.

I wish for Groove Music to update their interface

Granted: They update their interface to play "Play that funky music white boy."

I wish my funk was funky.

Granted, your funk was so funky everyone didn't like funk anymore.

I wish for Taylor Swift to announce what's her next re-recorded album by January

Granted: She re-announces that she has re-re-recorded the re-recorded recording of the record that she once recorded before the rights to her recordings got sold off.

I wish that makes sense.

Not granted. (you know why Swift's re-recording her albums? If so, cool )

I wish for Netflix and chill moments again

Granted: You watch movies on your smartphone while sitting in the snow.

I wish to Shake it Off.

(Yes I know why she is creating new versions of old hits, because of her old production company selling the rights off of her back catalogue in a way that liquided her off.)

Ha. forum censor got me . P.I.S.S.E.D

Edited December 29, 2021 by ColdJ

1 minute ago, ColdJ said:

I wish to Shake it Off.

Granted, you danced while your hands are tied.

I wish to know we can't have nice things.

2 minutes ago, ColdJ said:

(Yes I know why she is creating new versions of old hits, because of her old production company selling the rights off of her back catalogue in a way that liquided her off.)

Great!

Granted: Now you know we can't have nice things.

I wish things lasted when you need them too.

Granted, they lasted when they needed them least.

I wish for you to listen to any track of Red (Taylor's Version) upon seeing this

Granted: I watched and listened to this.

@Kerbal Productions In return I wish you  to watch and listen to.

Granted. Done.

Take this.

Granted: Listening as I type.. (We best stop posting video as this should probably be in the "What song is stuck in your head" thread.)

I wish voice was more important than flashy when it came to the music charts.

Granted. The Dog of Baskerville wins.

I wish Nessi is still alive. Haven't heard about her for a couple of decades.

Granted, Nessi hunts for you.

I wish for you to do magic tricks

Granted. The so-called "magic" is just a not enough understood subjective resolution of the quantum indeterminacy in the multiverse interpretation of the universe.

I wish, that's clear.

Yes, you wished.  That much was clear.  What wasn't clear was what you wished for.  So you get nothing.

I wish that @kerbiloid's last wish would have been clear.

Granted. I was wishing that my explanation of the magic is clear.

I rewish the previous wish.
